basic.description: This course offers an in-depth study of financial-reporting concepts and generally accepted practice, including an overview of the accounting-cycle assets and noncurrent assets. Emphasis is placed on analyzing financial events and the consequences of financial-reporting alternatives.
basic.subject: ACG
basic.title: Financial Accounting and Reporting I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: ACG 2021 and ACG 2071 with a grade of "B" or better.
